sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent[animate]] PLUMB NP2[location] (PP[theme]) May be used metaphorically to indicate examining something in great detail.
sense.examples: The parallel consists more of the emotional depths they both seek to plumb. It was a war of mentalities which had plumbed the abysses. Your rescue ship will be plumbed for every Federation secret aboard. He plumbed the Tech for information about the immediate environment. There were other matters yet to be plumbed.
